product_name: Black Diamond NiMH AAA Rechargeable Batteries - Package of 4
long_description: The rechargeable Black Diamond Nickel-Metal Hydride (NiMH) batteries work well with Black Diamond products that feature ReVolt technology as well as other electronics that use AAA batteries. 1,000 mAh batteries are compatible with the Black Diamond ReVolt headlamp (sold separately). Batteries can be charged in a Black Diamond ReVolt headlamp, or using a plug-in battery charger (sold separately).
short_description: The rechargeable Black Diamond Nickel-Metal Hydride (NiMH) batteries work well with Black Diamond products that feature ReVolt technology as well as other electronics that use AAA batteries.
